long_description:
Looking to relax and rejuvenate on your Napa Valley vacation? The best spas in St. Helena offer luxurious massages, facials, mud wraps, and more. From private treatment suites to a relaxation garden with local culinary delights, these St. Helena spas have everything you need for a little TLC.

Health Spa Napa Valley

Located only steps away from St. Helena’s charming Historic District, the Health Spa Napa Valley is your one-stop destination for a peaceful retreat away from life’s hustle and bustle. Use a day pass to enter the state-of-the-art wellness center and relax by the lap pool before your spa treatment. Visit their tranquil spa for a massage, skin care treatment, hot stone massage, mud wrap, sugar scrub, and more. Personalize your spa day by adding options from the ‘à la carte’ menu like a scalp massage or body butter application.

Meadowood Spa

Expect only the finest quality from Meadowood Spa. Your elevated experience begins with a Spa Therapist consultation in the privacy of your own calming treatment suite, complete with a private bathroom, steam shower, and built-in seating area. Design your specially curated plan and prepare for a day of total relaxation. Opt for the Essential Journey package, which includes a 60-minute massage and body treatment to step deeper into a state of overall well-being. After your private treatment, retreat to the Relaxation Garden for the steam room, sauna, and mineral soaking pool. Enjoy small bites from the delectable Spa Culinary Menu designed by Meadowood Chef Victoria Acosta in the Garden’s tranquil sitting area.

Wine Country Inn In-Room Spa Service

Forgo traveling into town altogether and have a spa stay-cation at the Wine Country Inn. In the comfort and privacy of your own room, have a personal spa experience by seasoned massage therapists. As you overlook the Napa Valley vineyards from your private patio, indulge in our Wine Country Bliss package, complete with a custom aromatherapy massage, cleansing facial, hair treatment, and foot scrub. From deep pressure massages to aromatherapy with natural blends, melt away tension and stress at the Wine Country Inn. Browse our complete list of in-room spa packages available to you.

Plan Your Restful Escape to the Wine Country Inn

Need some relaxation? Book your Napa Valley vacation at the Wine Country Inn, a luxury boutique hotel in the heart of wine country. Let us book your in-room spa package for you, or direct you to one of St. Helena’s nearby day spas. Pamper yourself with our comfortable accommodations and book your Napa Valley getaway today.
